Job Opportunity: Senior SAP BTP CAPM Developer

Company: InfoDrive Solutions
Location: Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia/ Singapore
Experience: 8+ Years

About Us:

InfoDrive Solutions is a dynamic and innovative technology company operating in Singapore, Malaysia, and the India. We are on the lookout for a highly skilled and experienced Senior SAP BTP CAPM Developer to join our team in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia and Singapore.

Job Title: SAP Business Technology Platform CAPM Cloud Application Programming Model  Developer

Key Responsibilities:


- Leverage a minimum of 8 years of progressive experience in cloud application development, specializing in SAP Business Technology Platform (BTP) with a strong focus on the Cloud Application Programming Model (CAPM).
- Lead and contribute to at least 2 end-to-end full lifecycle implementation projects, demonstrating expertise in designing and delivering successful solutions.
- Architect and implement hybrid cloud solutions by effectively integrating on-premises and cloud-based systems, ensuring seamless performance and connectivity.
- Utilize proficiency in SAP BTP services, CAPM, and related technologies like SAP Fiori, SAP HANA, and SAP Cloud Platform to drive innovation and efficiency.
- Apply a solid understanding of software development best practices, design patterns, and coding standards to create high-quality and maintainable applications.
- Exhibit strong problem-solving skills, diagnosing complex technical issues, and optimizing application performance for superior user experience.
- Collaborate effectively within a diverse and multicultural environment, showcasing excellent communication and interpersonal skills.

Qualifications:


- A minimum of 8 years' experience in developing cloud applications using SAP Business Technology Platform, with a significant focus on CAPM.
- Proven track record of contributing to a minimum of 2 end-to-end full lifecycle implementation projects.
- Expertise in architecting and implementing hybrid cloud solutions, integrating on-premises and cloud systems.
- Proficiency in SAP BTP services, CAPM, and associated technologies (SAP Fiori, SAP HANA, SAP Cloud Platform).
- Thorough understanding of software development best practices, design patterns, and coding standards.
- Exceptional problem-solving abilities, capable of resolving intricate technical challenges and optimizing application performance.
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, fostering effective teamwork across cultures.
- Prior experience in leadership or mentoring roles is advantageous.
- SAP certification(s) related to BTP, CAPM, or cloud development is a plus.
- Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Information Technology, or related field.

If you're ready to be part of a dynamic team that thrives on innovation and excellence, please submit your application with a detailed CV and cover letter to [email address]. Join us in shaping the future of technology at InfoDrive Solutions.


Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for further evaluation.
